For the memes...
I really tried a normal deck (didn’t want to use CA or Ninja or GB, because they are boring AF). But in the end this was the most fun deck for me lmao. And I just wanted to reach KoG with it. A wise man once said “fight cancer with cancer”.
Played two magical mallets instead of Cup if Ace and Restruction Revolution, because I don’t like gambling and it is good to refresh your hand if you didn’t draw well
